about_the_game:
Every hero needs a place to kick back and rest after a long day of journeying. Bring those pitstops to life with this civilization inspired music pack.

With songs for a wide variety of castles, towns, and bustling cities, your adventurers will always have a place to call home. G3: Civilization is a great addition to your growing library of RPG Maker resources.

Tracklist:

1 - Castle001
2 - Castle002
3 - Castle003
4 - Castle004
1 - Town 001
2 - Town 002
3 - Town 003
4 - Town 004
5 - Town 005
6 - Town 006

Features:

  • 4 Castle themes.
  • 6 Town themes that fit a variety of towns. From home sweet home, to downtown nightlife.
  • Each song was carefully crafted for RPG Maker, and loops seamlessly in the program.
  • OGG and .M4A formats
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - G3: Civilizations

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
